#summary Common Hackzor lingo
#labels Featured

=== Server ===
 The django application hackzor.server, that's housed within [http://code.google.com/p/hackzor/source/browse/trunk/server hackzor/server] ||
=== Evaluator ===
 The python application that is responsible for compiling user submits and judging them using problem-specific [#Judge judge]
=== Judge ===
 A special program specified for each question, that will be responsible for judging the correctness of user-submitted solutions
=== Hackzor ===
 [http://code.google.com/u/prashmohan/ prashmohan] came up with the name.
